title: What's cooking: Tomato Soup with Crab Cilantro
text:
STOWE, Vt. - Chef Michael Kloeti from Michael's on the Hill appeared on the Morning show to prepare a chilled tomato soup.
Chilled Summer Tomato Soup with Cilantro & Crab
Yield: 4 servings (4 cups)
Ingredients:
3 Pounds Tomatoes, very ripe
2 Tablespoons Olive oil
4 Each Garlic cloves, peeled, chopped
2 Each Shallots, peeled, chopped
To Taste Salt & fresh ground black pepper
¼ Cup Crab meat, lump, fresh, picked for shells
3 Each Sprigs, leaves picked off stems
4 Teaspoons Sour Cream
1 Each Lime zest
Method:
-In olive oil, sauté garlic and shallots until translucent, cool.
-Combine all ingredients, and in a blender, blend until entirely puréed, with no chunks.
-Chill for 1 hour.
-Top with a dollop of sour cream, fresh crab meat cilantro and the zest of lime.
